params.beacon: The address of the beacon to register

returns.appId: The attestation UID of the registered app

params.clients: The list of client contract addresses that will use this app

returns.appId: The attestation UID of the registered app

adminBanApp(address).notice: Ban a app from the registry

adminRegisterAppBeacon(address).notice: Register a beacon for creating upgradeable apps

adminRegisterAppSchema(string,address,bo.notice: Set the schema ID used for app registrations

getAppById(bytes32).notice: Get the attestation for a app

getAppSchema().notice: Get the schema structure used for registering apps

getAppSchemaId().notice: Get the active schema ID used for app attestations

getLatestAppId(address).notice: Get the current version (attestation UID) for a app

isAppBanned(address).notice: Check if a app is banned

registerApp(address,address[]).notice: Register a new app with permissions

removeApp(bytes32).notice: Remove a app from the registry
